author: mamta
msg: DERBY-6778(SSL tests are failing on 10.8 codeline with IBM jdk 1.4.2 after poodle security backport)

In order to work around the IBM jdk 1.4.2 issue, we will bypass the poodle security code introduced by DERBY-6764 for IBM jdk 1.4.2 in only 10.8 codeline(since the failure is only with that jdk). Jdk 1.4 is pretty old and hopefully we do not have anyone using that jdk anymore.
